Interface BreadcrumbStateRenderer<S,V>

Type Parameters:
S - state type
V - value type
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBreadcrumbStateRenderer
public interface BreadcrumbStateRenderer<S,V>
Renderer for Breadcrumb states.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JComponent
    createStateComponent(JBreadcrumb<S,V> viewer, int stateIdx, S state, V value, boolean hasFocus)
    Creates a component to render the state in the breadcrumb.
    int
    getComponentOffset()
    Returns the amount of space (may be negative) that should exist between this state component and the last.

  • Method Details

    • createStateComponent

      JComponent createStateComponent(JBreadcrumb<S,V> viewer, int stateIdx, S state, V value, boolean hasFocus)
      Creates a component to render the state in the breadcrumb.
      Parameters:
      viewer - the breadcrumb viewer
      stateIdx - the index of the state
      state - the state to render
      value - the value associated with the state
      hasFocus - whether the state has focus
      Returns:
      the component for rendering the state

    • getComponentOffset

      int getComponentOffset()
      Returns the amount of space (may be negative) that should exist between this state component and the last.
      Returns:
      component horizontal offset
